page.title: 20Credits
page.content: This section has been compiled by Brian Smith of The Beeches School. I am grateful to Sheila Frisby of The Beeches School and to Jill Slidel and Brian Haynes of St. Augustine's School for their help. My thanks also to the following people from the community for their contributions:- 2{ +William Petriburg,}_ The Bishop 3 {Bob Burke, }_ The Mayor 6 {John Harper-Tee,}Evening Telegraph 7 {The Girls on the Town Hall desk 8 {Hilary Dawson,}Education Dept. 9 {John Shearman,}Headteacher 12{The Community Welfare Officer 13{Geoffrey Summers,}Hospital Admin. 14{Philip Hoare,}Evening Telegraph 15{Nicolle Beasley,}Hereward Radio 16{Bill Hollowell,}British Sugar 17{The Traffic Manager,}P'boro Station 18{George Dixon 19{Sheila Frisby,}Deputy Headteacher
